system.effect: Prerequisites: 3 of Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth, Survival, Guile, or Perception Skills at Expert Rank 2 AP – Free Action, Interrupt Trigger: A foe attempts to run away Effect: Before the target moves from its starting location, one of your Pokémon on the field may immediately Shift and use a Struggle Attack as an Interrupt. If this attack hits, the target is Tripped.
